nodes.text: This Corellian fleet saw action as part of the Galactic Republic's counter-offensive during the Great Sith War in 3996 BBY. It halted a joint Krath and Sith offensive into the Corellian Run that had seen the capture of several worlds including Ando, Rodia and Bothawui. The Corellians scored several key victories at Gyndine, Denon and Gamorr which helped turn the tide in the Republic and Jedi's favor.
